Articles.Content:
This plane is based on the Cloakshape Fighter from X-Wing Alliance. The Space Tug mod was exactly what I needed for the cockpit. The Cloakshape Fighter was best used as a defensive fighter. These were said to be around before the Clone Wars. They weren't the best dogfighters, but their armor made up for that... It could also be modified a lot...

More info on that here: http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/CloakShape_fighter

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Try not to pull a tight turn shortly after takeoff... it could nosedive.

Mods used:

Space Tug http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83364

RasterPropMonitor http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117471-1-0-RasterPropMonitor-still-putting-the-A-in-IVA

Craft file: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83364
I came for an actual X-wing... from SW

I came for an actual X-wing... from SW

Well that's not very friendly. The spacecraft exchange is for finding new things, try to be a bit more positive about stuff people have worked hard on and want to share. Besides, it didn't say it was an x-wing. It said it was a cloakshape fighter, from the x-wing series of games. If you REALLY don't want to see anything else, read more carefully.

And it's a really good replica! Lots of the little rectangular chunky bits that are so important for spaceships to do... something. It's nice to see people occasionally making the more obscure ships and things. Maybe try to ssto it next pheeph. That would be cool.

Well done man, looks really good.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

Well that's not very friendly. The spacecraft exchange is for finding new things, try to be a bit more positive about stuff people have worked hard on and want to share. Besides, it didn't say it was an x-wing. It said it was a cloakshape fighter, from the x-wing series of games. If you REALLY don't want to see anything else, read more carefully.

And it's a really good replica! Lots of the little rectangular chunky bits that are so important for spaceships to do... something. It's nice to see people occasionally making the more obscure ships and things. Maybe try to ssto it next pheeph. That would be cool.

Glad you like it. I wish I could SSTO the Cloakshape Fighter... there's always the issue of thrust and fuel capacity.

You can check out the other replicas of Star Wars ships I made based on the X-Wing series of games:

Assault Gunboat: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124518-X-Wing-Series-Cygnus-XG-1-Starwing-Assault-Gunboat

TIE Avenger: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124622-X-Wing-Series-TIE-Avenger?highlight=tie+avenger
